refnamediv.refpurpose: connect to a line-protocol server on a remote host.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: mconnect uses tcpclient1 to connect to TCP port port on host, and the runs mconnect-io1.
Its default use is to enable UNIX tools to have a conversation with a network SMTP server. If port is not supplied, the default is 25. If host is not supplied, the default is the local host.

refsection.title: History
refsection.para: mconnect was originally part of DanielJ.Bernstein's ucspi-tcp toolset in 1999.

refsection.title: Author
refsection.para: Original code and documentation by DanielJ.Bernstein. Documentation modernizations by Jonathande Boyne Pollard.
